definition: rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: There was a deep plot to assassinate the leader.
sentences.chinese: 有个刺杀领导人的老谋深算的密谋。

sentences.english: This precise behavior, makes you think he is exploitative and conniving.
sentences.chinese: 那些精明的行为让你觉得他是个老谋深算的剥削者。

sentences.english: Mike:this guy did not look like the psyco killer type.
sentences.chinese: 这家伙看上去不像个老谋深算的杀手。

definition: variant of 老奸巨猾[lao3 jian1 ju4 hua2]
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
subtle way of thinking (idiom); hard to fathom/deep and shrewd
experienced in the ways of the world (idiom); worldly-wise/sophisticated
